content: seahorse applique materials yarn medium worsted in orange 7 m 7 ¾ yd and teal 3 5 m 4 yd small amounts of black 1 m 1 ¼ yd and white 0 5 m ¾ yd hook 4 00 mm tapestry needle blunt-end needle finishing & embroidery gauge & final size the gauge for this pattern is 16 half_double_crochet x 13 row worked with 4 00 mm hook the final size is 12 cm x 5 cm 4 ¾ in x 2 in stitches & techniques used stitches chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet triple crochet treble_crochet increase/decrease stitches increase/decrease techniques magic_ring slip knot & foundation chain work in front/back loops invisible finish abbreviations the instruction join round reads join the round with slip_stitch in the beginning stitch of the round the expression st s stands for stitch es pattern this seahorse applique is worked on right side only round 1 8 single_crochet start with an adjustable or magic ring in orange chain 1 make 8 single_crochet in ring join round round 2 16 single_crochet chain 1 make single_crochet increase in each st join round this starts the head continue to work the nose chain 4 make single_crochet in the second st from hook then slip_stitch in next 2 sts continue to work the body slip_stitch in next 3 sts chain 27 then make slip_stitch in next 15 sts starting with the second chain from hook then single_crochet in next st half_double_crochet decrease double_crochet decrease treble_crochet decrease double_crochet decrease half_double_crochet decrease fasten_off with invisible finish attach teal in the tip of the tail and working in back loops only make slip_stitch chain 1 x 15 times slip_stitch in next st half_double_crochet decrease chain 2 make a fan of 5 treble_crochet in the same next st chain 2 single_crochet decrease over the last 2 sts of the body continue work to finish the head make slip_stitch chain 2 x 9 times and slip_stitch in last st this should be 2 stitches away from nose ❖ use back and white yarn to embroider the visible eye over 1 single_crochet between rnds 1 & 2 of the head enjoy seahorse applique copyright © 2019 silvia-carmen
